liver warts and...?

1583.04.text:
You get a set of bonuses, this time
on world rulers, St Catharine's.

1587.44.text:
I will read a list of rulers
who were on the throne

1589.56.text:
or in power during the first year
of a century of the Common Era.

1593.40.text:
In each case,
I simply want the century.

1595.68.text:
Firstly, Tiridates III of Armenia and
the Eastern Roman Emperor Diocletian?

1604.28.text:
Kavadh I of Sassanid Persia
and Clovis I of the Franks.

1611.68.text:
And finally, the Emperor Ningzong
of the Southern Song dynasty

1617.48.text: Philip II? Second of France? Yeah.

1621.80.text:
12th. No, it's the 13th.
Ten points for this.

1625.00.text:
Rarotonga, a mountainous volcanic
island in the South Pacific

1628.52.text: is the chief island of which group?

1634.16.text:
You get a set of bonuses
on abstract algebra.

1636.68.text:
What mathematical structure
is defined as a commutative ring

1640.08.text:
in which every non-zero element
is invertible? Field.

1644.64.text:
What term is used for the additive
order of the unit element of a ring?

1648.28.text:
In arithmetic, the same word
refers to the integer part

1651.48.text: of a logarithm in base ten.

1657.08.text:
Don't know. Um, what was the
first half of the question? Tenth...

1660.64.text:
Come on, let's have it quickly.
Um, order... Come on!

1666.44.text:
The characteristic of
every finite field is equal to

1668.88.text: a member of which set of integers?

1673.00.text:
The prime numbers. Correct.
Ten points for this starter question.

1679.76.text:
At the gong,
St Catharine's have 170,

1688.68.text:
Well, you gave them a run for their
money, St Catharine's. Well done.

1692.08.text:
You'll be coming back anyway
to play another quarterfinal.

1695.16.text:
Which you will have to win
to stay in the contest.

1697.72.text:
St John's, congratulations.
You have to win one more.

1700.84.text:
But on today's form, that
shouldn't be too difficult for you.

1704.80.text:
I hope you can join us next time
for another quarterfinal match.

1707.84.text:
Until then, it's goodbye from
St Catharine's College - Cambridge.

1710.68.text:
TEAM: Goodbye! Goodbye from
St John's College - Oxford.

1713.08.text:
TEAM: Goodbye.
And it's goodbye from me. Goodbye.
